entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle mixed with drizzle. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle becoming mixed with light snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
